item.mymodtest.moon_glow_katana.effect_d: Night moonlight attacks may apply Moon Trace
Consume mark for bonus physical + delayed magic damage
tooltip.mymodtest.moon_glow_katana.line1: Under moonlight, each strike leaves a pale promise.
tooltip.mymodtest.moon_glow_katana.line2: Marked foes are answered by a quieter second wound.
item.mymodtest.regret_blade.effect_desc1: 30% chance to cut 30% current HP (target HP > 10)
item.mymodtest.regret_blade.effect_desc3: Cannot deliver the final blow (keeps target at >=1 HP)
tooltip.mymodtest.regret_blade.subtitle: [Life Cut]
tooltip.mymodtest.regret_blade.line1: It trims fate, not the final breath.
tooltip.mymodtest.regret_blade.line2: Deep wounds stop at the edge of mercy.
item.mymodtest.eclipse_blade.effect_desc: 40% chance to inflict Eclipse mark (2.5s trigger CD per target)
Mark applies 2 random debuffs; boss duration is halved
tooltip.mymodtest.eclipse_blade.subtitle: [Lunar Eclipse]
tooltip.mymodtest.eclipse_blade.line1: Dark light settles on the target like a hush.
tooltip.mymodtest.eclipse_blade.line2: Curses bloom where the mark remains.
item.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.effect_caus: Causality Reversal: When low HP, equalize enemy HP
item.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.effect_pene: Marked targets: penetration bonus damage (35%, boss 17.5%)
tooltip.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.subtitle: [ReadWrite]
tooltip.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.line1: It reads fear, then edits destiny.
item.mymodtest.nmap_katana.module_discov: Host Discovery: warning scan -> Resistance V (2s, max chain 3)
item.mymodtest.nmap_katana.module_vuln: Vuln Scan: +50% crit bonus vs armor=0 (3s CD)
tooltip.mymodtest.nmap_katana.subtitle: [Nmap Protocol]
tooltip.mymodtest.nmap_katana.line2: Threat = targeting you; fallback: <=12, visible, moving toward you.
tooltip.mymodtest.nmap_katana.line3: On threat: Resistance V for 2s. Max 3 refreshes.
item.mymodtest.sentinel_helmet.lore: When the dark moves, the watch bell answers.
item.mymodtest.sentinel_helmet.effect: [Echo Pulse] In darkness, detect nearby hostiles and gain Speed I for 1.5s with an alert chime. Range: 16 blocks. Cooldown: 40s
item.mymodtest.silent_oath_helmet.lore: The first strike is forgiven—after that, you pay in full.
item.mymodtest.silent_oath_helmet.effect: [Silent Oath] First hit from hostile mobs reduced by 2 damage. Cooldown: 30s
item.mymodtest.exile_mask_helmet.effect: [Desperation] Below 50% HP: +1 attack per 7.5% HP lost (max +4). Updates every 1s
item.mymodtest.relic_circlet_helmet.lore: Attention is a curse—this ring turns it into shelter.
item.mymodtest.relic_circlet_helmet.effe: [Guardian Aura] Gain Absorption I for 3s when first targeted by a mob. Cooldown: 30s
[Second Chance] Survive lethal explosion damage once, set to 1 HP with Resistance V for 2s. Totem takes priority. Cooldown: 15min
item.mymodtest.old_market_chestplate.lor: Old coins still ring true—if you know where to spend them.
item.mymodtest.old_market_chestplate.eff: [Market Wisdom] Trade XP: 50% chance ×1.5 (first trade per slot, CD 60s). Kill XP: 25% chance ×2 (CD 30s)
item.mymodtest.blood_pact_chestplate.lor: Signed in blood—paid on the next strike.
item.mymodtest.blood_pact_chestplate.eff: [Blood Pact] 50% on hit: self-damage min(50% dmg, 2♥) stored (max 4♥). Next attack consumes pool as bonus damage. 10s window
item.mymodtest.ghost_god_chestplate.lore: Undead curses stop at the edge of this steel.
item.mymodtest.ghost_god_chestplate.effe: [Ghost Ward] Undead damage: 30% (Boss 15%) chance -15%. Undead debuffs (Wither/Hunger/Slowness): 50% (Boss 25%) immune
tooltip.mymodtest.ghost_god_chestplate.l: Undead malice fades against this iron hush.
Their curses falter at your chest.
item.mymodtest.windbreaker_chestplate.ef: [Windbreaker] +30% knockback resistance. When HP drops from ≥50% to <50%: Speed I 5s (CD 90s, rearm at 60%)
tooltip.mymodtest.windbreaker_chestplate: The wind cannot move a steady heart.
When panic rises, your stride answers.
Every five seconds, the void takes its bite.
[Void Bite] On attack: +4% true damage (Boss 2%). CD: 5s
item.mymodtest.smuggler_shin_leggings.lo: A cutpurse's luck—measured, timed, and never free.
item.mymodtest.smuggler_shin_leggings.ef: [Loot Bonus] On kill: 20% extra loot roll + 10% double drop (Boss: 10%/5%). CD: 40s. No PVP
item.mymodtest.smuggler_pouch_leggings.l: Nothing vanishes—everything simply finds its way home.
item.mymodtest.smuggler_pouch_leggings.e: [Magnet] Auto-pull items within 6 blocks for 5s. CD: 35s. Items only (no XP orbs)
item.mymodtest.graze_guard_leggings.lore: A step aside—paid for in scars you never received.
item.mymodtest.graze_guard_leggings.effe: [Graze] 18% chance: reduce damage by 60%. CD: 12s. Living attackers only
item.mymodtest.stealth_shin_leggings.lor: The street remembers every fall—and teaches you which ones to ignore.
item.mymodtest.stealth_shin_leggings.eff: [Fall Pad] Charge 1 layer per 45s (max 2). Fall >=1.5HP: consume 1 layer, reduce 80%
item.mymodtest.clear_ledger_leggings.lor: Every settled debt lightens the stride.
item.mymodtest.clear_ledger_leggings.eff: [Speed Stride] Kill: Speed I 3s. Kill during CD: +1s (max 6s). CD: 16s. No PVP
Where you walk, no trail remains.
[Vanish] 12s out of combat: Invisibility 3s (no particles). CD: 45s
tooltip.mymodtest.untraceable_treads_boo: When battle forgets you, so does the world.
Your outline fades between two heartbeats.
item.mymodtest.boundary_walker_boots.eff: [Boundary Leap] Overworld outdoor + rain/thunder/snow/night: Jump Boost I. Refreshes while conditions met
Under open sky, weather becomes a stairway.
You step where others only jump.
item.mymodtest.ghost_step_boots.lore: The living pass through you like wind.
item.mymodtest.ghost_step_boots.effect: [Phantom] Out of combat: entities cannot push you. In combat: push returns. Hit 2x in 1s: 1s emergency no-push (CD 15s)
tooltip.mymodtest.ghost_step_boots.line1: Crowds pass through you like mist.
item.mymodtest.marching_boots.lore: Steady pace, steady mind—until the blade falls.
item.mymodtest.marching_boots.effect: [March] 8s no attack + 4s no damage: Speed II (max 15s). Attack to cancel + 12s CD
tooltip.mymodtest.marching_boots.line1: Calm steps gather speed like a marching drum.
tooltip.mymodtest.marching_boots.line2: Strike too soon, and the rhythm shatters.
item.mymodtest.gossamer_boots.lore: Silk cannot bind what silk has made.
item.mymodtest.gossamer_boots.effect: [Web Walk] In cobweb: 70% less slowdown. Slowness II downgraded to I. Effect fades on exit
tooltip.mymodtest.gossamer_boots.line2: Webs lose their claim on your ankles.
tooltip.mymodtest.acer.subtitle: [Keen Edge]
tooltip.mymodtest.acer.line1: A clean blade for decisive critical moments.
tooltip.mymodtest.velox.subtitle: [Swift Blade]
tooltip.mymodtest.fatalis.subtitle: [Heavy Strike]
tooltip.mymodtest.fatalis.line2: Each hit sounds like a final answer.
item.mymodtest.scavenger_goggles.lore: See through the dust, find what others miss.
item.mymodtest.sanctified_hood.lore: Consecrated cloth that dulls hostile sorcery.
item.mymodtest.reactive_bug_plate.lore: A plate that 'patches out' arthropod bites on contact.
item.mymodtest.ritual_robe.lore: Woven for ceremonies, worn for survival.
item.mymodtest.wrapped_leggings.lore: Layered cloth over leather—mobile, if not elegant.
item.mymodtest.reinforced_greaves.lore: Heavy plate from hip to knee—built for the front line.
item.mymodtest.cargo_pants.lore: Deep pockets, lucky finds—keep the lights burning.
item.mymodtest.cargo_pants.effect: [Lucky Pocket] 15% chance to return a torch when placed. CD: 10s
item.mymodtest.penitent_boots.lore: Walk in humility; the road forgives no one.
tooltip.mymodtest.sentinel_helmet.line1: In the dark, the helm hears what you cannot.
tooltip.mymodtest.silent_oath_helmet.lin: The second reminds you of the vow.
tooltip.mymodtest.exile_mask_helmet.line: When blood runs low, resolve runs high.
tooltip.mymodtest.relic_circlet_helmet.l: Hostile eyes awaken a gentle shield.
A brief mercy in the opening heartbeat.
tooltip.mymodtest.retracer_ornament_helm: At the brink, time stutters once.
One borrowed heartbeat to step back.
Pain saved now, vengeance paid later.
Debt in blood, settled on impact.
tooltip.mymodtest.void_devourer_chestpla: The void takes a quiet bite with each opening.
tooltip.mymodtest.smuggler_shin_leggings: The street rewards those who survive it.
Sometimes the fallen leave a little extra.
tooltip.mymodtest.smuggler_pouch_legging: Drops drift back like loyal shadows.
tooltip.mymodtest.graze_guard_leggings.l: Some blows pass like rain on stone.
A near miss becomes a narrow mercy.
The ground softens for a careful step.
Stored grace breaks the worst falls.
Each settled score lightens your stride.
tooltip.mymodtest.sanctified_hood.line1: A quiet prayer sewn into cloth.
tooltip.mymodtest.reactive_bug_plate.lin: Chitin and steel negotiate in your favor.
tooltip.mymodtest.cargo_pants.subtitle: [Lucky Pocket]
tooltip.mymodtest.cargo_pants.line1: One pocket is deeper than it should be.
tooltip.mymodtest.cargo_pants.line2: Now and then, the road gives back.
tooltip.mymodtest.cushion_hiking_boots.l: The trail forgives a hard landing.
Impact turns soft at your heel.
item.mymodtest.moon_glow_katana.lore: "A silver oath carved into the dark."
item.mymodtest.oblivion_edge.lore: "To read is to steal; to write is to wound."
item.mymodtest.acer.lore: "A measured hand makes the keenest cut."
item.mymodtest.fatalis.lore: "One strike, and the room goes quiet."
tooltip.mymodtest.regret_blade.tagline: A blade that knows only regret.
tooltip.mymodtest.eclipse_blade.tagline: When the moon devours the sun...
tooltip.mymodtest.acer.tagline: A clean edge for perfect timing.
Every debt paid, every step lighter.
Rain and night become a stairway.
tooltip.mymodtest.cargo_pants.tagline: One pocket is luckier than it looks.
